name: WakeUpNeo-9
description:
In the past, mankind created robots to help them with ordinary tasks. One of these robots suffered a system failure that infected the other robots through electricity. This anomaly made some robots aggressive and ended humanity and all living things except cats.

WakeUpNeo9 is a top-down chilling bullet-hell with a lot of CATS!!!

The game was made by three university students: Cora Real, Nil Muns, and Héctor Vergel, for a project.

Currently in early access.
